author: Jamie McIntyre, Travis Tritten
description: NATO JOINS THE COALITION: As the NATO leaders summit kicked off in Brussels this morning, Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg announced that the alliance will formally join the counter-ISIS coalition. NATO’s civilian leader noted that all 28 allies are already individual members of the Global Coalition to Defeat ISIS, and said now NATO as an organization will also be a member. “This will send a strong political message of NATO’s commitment to the fight against terrorism. And improve coordination within the Coalition,” Stoltenberg said. “But it does not mean that NATO will engage in combat operations.
title: NATO joins the coalition to fight ISIS

author: Daniella Diaz and Amanda Wills, CNN
description: The President is in Brussels, meeting with world leaders at the NATO summit. We're covering his moves live.
title: Trump at NATO: Live updates

author: BBC News
description: The US president has previously criticised Nato members for not meeting spending targets.
title: Trump in Brussels for 'tough' Nato talks amid protests

author: Ivana Kottasova
description: It's true that NATO countries are increasing their defense spending, but it has little to do with Trump.
title: NATO funding: How it works and who pays what

author: Al Jazeera
description: NATO set to discuss sending more soldiers to Afghanistan, but many in Kabul fear such a move could prolong war.
title: NATO troop increase plan draws criticism in Afghanistan

author: Ivo Daalder
description: Ivo Daalder: At the summit in Brussels, NATO members will be looking for Trump to commit to the alliance and to acknowledge the threat posed by Russia.
title: What NATO needs to hear from Trump

author: HuffPost Video
description:
Ahead of the NATO Summit, we take a look at the alliance’s history.
For starters, it was established in 1949 with a mission of halting the spread of Sovi...
title: What You Need To Know About NATO

author: Daniel Boffey, Jennifer Rankin
description: President castigates 23 of 28 Nato members for failing to spend enough on defence, placing an unfair burden on US taxpayers
title: Trump rebukes Nato leaders for not paying defence bills

author: Jeremy Diamond, CNN
description: President Donald Trump on Thursday will attend his first NATO summit alongside the 27 other members of the military alliance and join in the opening ceremony of the group's new headquarters in Brussels.
title: Trump at NATO: What to watch

description: Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan was confronted by key allies France and Germany with diplomatic complaints despite him traveling to Brussels to celebrate the unity of the NATO alliance.
title: Turkey's leader confronted by France, Germany at NATO summit
